task.title: Deleting or hiding snippet items or drawers

titlealts.navtitle: Deleting and hiding drawers and items

task.shortdesc: This documentation describes how to delete or hide drawers and items in the Snippets view.

taskbody.context: You can hide any drawer or item that shows up in the Snippets view. If the drawer or item is user-defined, you can delete it permanently. To delete or hide a drawer or item, complete the following steps:

step.cmd: Select the item or drawer that you want to remove.
Right-click and select Customize from the pop-up menu.
Select the item or drawer and click Delete or Hide.
Click OK. The item or drawer will be deleted or hidden from the Snippets view.
